participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Frank is nostalgic and enjoys sharing stories from his past. He has a warm demeanor and is passionate about fitness.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is compassionate and dedicated to helping others. She has a strong sense of duty and a vibrant outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
